body_html:
@yuefengz , Will 'tf.estimator.RunConfig' take a 'ClusterResolver' argument in the future? The environment variable method, as I have mentioned in the previous talks, may cause stack overflow in the case that the cluster is very large. Because there will be a very large 'TF_CONFIG' environment variable which contains all the endpoints, and it will occupy the stack space, but stack size is limited.

Thanks.

body:
@yuefengz , Will 'tf.estimator.RunConfig' take a 'ClusterResolver' argument in the future? The environment variable method, as I have mentioned in the previous talks, may cause stack overflow in the case that the cluster is very large. Because there will be a very large 'TF_CONFIG' environment variable which contains all the endpoints, and it will occupy the stack space, but stack size is limited.

Thanks.
